description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，属民主进步党，曾任立法委员、行政院客家委员会主任委员、民主进步党秘书长等职，现任海峡交流基金会副董事长兼秘书长。早年为陈水扁的重要幕僚。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Democratic Progressive Party. He has served as a Legislator, Minister of the Hakka Affairs Council, and Secretary-General of the Democratic Progressive Party. He currently serves as the Vice Chairman and Secretary-General of the Straits Exchange Foundation. In his early years, he was a key aide to Chen Shui-bian.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，中华民国第10、11任总统。罗文嘉早年是其重要幕僚，被称为其“文胆”。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the 10th and 11th President of the Republic of China. Luo Wen-jia was his key aide in his early career, known as his 'literary confidant'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一所著名综合性研究型公立大学。
description.en: A prominent public comprehensive research university in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国处理海峡两岸交流事务的半官方机构。
description.en: A semi-official organization in the Republic of China responsible for handling cross-strait exchange affairs.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任民主进步党主席、行政院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who has served as Chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party and Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 1997年在台北市发生的一起因拔河比赛安全措施不足导致的严重意外事件。
description.en: A serious accident that occurred in Taipei City in 1997 during a tug-of-war competition due to inadequate safety measures.

description.zh-cn: 涉及台湾前总统陈水扁及其亲属的贪污案件。
description.en: A corruption case involving former Taiwanese President Chen Shui-bian and his relatives.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民进党扁系立法委员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and a pro-Chen Shui-bian faction legislator of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，属中国国民党，曾任台北县县长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Kuomintang, who served as the Magistrate of Taipei County.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、政治评论家。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and political commentator.

description.zh-cn: 一项主张将中华民国的国家名称和象征物修改为能代表台湾本土的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement advocating for the change of the official name and national symbols of the Republic of China to ones that are representative of Taiwan's local identity.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，属民主进步党，曾任中常委。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Democratic Progressive Party, who has served as a member of the Central Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 天主教台湾地区主教团荣休主席、天主教台北总教区荣休总主教。
description.en: Archbishop Emeritus of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Taipei and President Emeritus of the Chinese Regional Bishops' Conference in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾企业家，三立电视董事长，民进党海派（涌言会）精神领袖。
description.en: A Taiwanese entrepreneur, Chairman of Sanlih E-Television, and the spiritual leader of the 'Ocean Voice' (Yung-yan) faction within the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 罗文嘉的妻子。
description.en: The wife of Luo Wen-jia.

description.zh-cn: 台湾桃园市下辖的市辖区，为罗文嘉的出生地。
description.en: A district in Taoyuan City, Taiwan, and the birthplace of Luo Wen-jia.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，属民主进步党。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，属民主进步党新潮流系。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician belonging to the New Tide faction of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国有关客家事务的最高主管机关，隶属于行政院。
description.en: The highest governing body for Hakka affairs in the Republic of China, under the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高立法机关。
description.en: The highest legislative body of the Republic of China.

zh-cn: 行政院文化建设委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华民国文化部的前身，曾是负责文化事务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The predecessor of the Ministry of Culture of the Republic of China, formerly the highest authority for cultural affairs.

description.zh-cn: 刘昭仪是罗文嘉的妻子。
description.en: Liu Zhao-yi is the wife of Luo Wen-jia.

description.zh-cn: 罗文嘉出生于桃园县新屋乡（今桃园市新屋区）。
description.en: Luo Wen-jia was born in Xinyu Township, Taoyuan County (now Xinwu District, Taoyuan City).

degree.zh-cn: 政治学系国际关系组学士
degree.en: Bachelor's degree in Political Science, International Relations Division

position.zh-cn: 党员、秘书长、文宣部主任、中央常务委员
position.en: Party member, Secretary-General, Director of the Department of Culture and Information, Central Standing Committee member

position.zh-cn: 国会助理、国会办公室主任、台北市政府新闻处处长
position.en: Parliamentary Assistant, Director of Congressional Office, Director of Taipei City Government's Department of Information

description.zh-cn: 罗文嘉在陈水扁担任立法委员及台北市市长期间，长期担任其核心幕僚与助理，被称为其“文胆”。
description.en: During Chen Shui-bian's tenure as a legislator and Mayor of Taipei, Luo Wen-jia served as his core aide and assistant for a long time, known as his 'literary confidant'.

position.en: Secretary-General of the Democratic Progressive Party

description.zh-cn: 罗文嘉在卓荣泰担任党主席期间，出任党秘书长。
description.en: Luo Wen-jia served as the party's Secretary-General during Cho Jung-tai's chairmanship.

description.zh-cn: 因该事件，时任台北市政府新闻处长的罗文嘉引咎辞职。
description.en: Due to this incident, Luo Wen-jia, then Director of the Taipei City Government's Department of Information, resigned to take responsibility.

description.zh-cn: 在2005年台北县县长选举中，国民党籍的周锡玮击败了民进党籍的罗文嘉。
description.en: In the 2005 Taipei County magistrate election, Chou Hsi-wei of the Kuomintang defeated Luo Wen-jia of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 罗文嘉公开批评陈水扁在国务机要费案中的抗辩策略“很糟糕”，引发挺扁人士的强烈抨击。
description.en: Luo Wen-jia publicly criticized Chen Shui-bian's defense strategy in the state affairs fund case as 'very terrible', drawing strong criticism from Chen's supporters.

description.zh-cn: 因罗文嘉批评陈水扁，高志鹏批评罗文嘉“全世界的人都可对阿扁划清界限，只有罗文嘉不行”。
description.en: Because Luo Wen-jia criticized Chen Shui-bian, Kao Chih-peng criticized Luo, stating, 'Anyone in the world can draw a line with A-Bian, except for Luo Wen-jia'.

description.zh-cn: 在2011年民进党台北市第二选举区立委初选中，姚文智击败罗文嘉获得提名。
description.en: In the 2011 DPP primary for the Taipei City Constituency 2 legislative seat, Pasuya Yao defeated Luo Wen-jia to win the nomination.

description.zh-cn: 罗文嘉认为现阶段推动台湾正名修宪或制宪，恐加剧台湾社会分裂，引发陈水扁及独派不满。
description.en: Luo Wen-jia believed that promoting name rectification, constitutional amendment, or new constitution at the current stage could intensify social division in Taiwan, causing dissatisfaction from Chen Shui-bian and pro-independence groups.

description.zh-cn: 王定宇因不满罗文嘉主导的党中央人事任命是“小圈圈任命”，宣布辞去中常委以示抗议。
description.en: Dissatisfied with what he called 'coterie appointments' in the party's central leadership orchestrated by Luo Wen-jia, Wang Ting-yu announced his resignation from the Central Standing Committee in protest.

description.zh-cn: 洪山川指控罗文嘉强租天主教宜兰教区土地，双方发生公开争执。
description.en: Hung Shan-chuan accused Luo Wen-jia of forcibly leasing land from the Catholic Diocese of Yilan, leading to a public dispute between the two.

description.zh-cn: 罗文嘉公开批评以林昆海为首的海派掌握媒体资源，介入党内事务，壮大自身势力。
description.en: Luo Wen-jia publicly criticized the 'Ocean Voice' faction, led by Lin Kun-hai, for using its media resources to interfere in party affairs and expand its own power.

description.zh-cn: 罗文嘉公开批评民进党已成为“世俗化政党”，不再是他熟悉的政党，此言论引发党内争议。
description.en: Luo Wen-jia publicly criticized the DPP for having become a 'secularized party' that he no longer recognized, a comment that sparked controversy within the party.

description.zh-cn: 因罗文嘉在立委补选中不支持民进党候选人，段宜康对此提出强烈抨击。
description.en: Duan Yi-kang strongly criticized Luo Wen-jia for not supporting the DPP candidate in a legislative by-election.
